oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Lori Harrington Oral History Interview, 2011 August 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Lori Harrington conducted on 27 August 2011 by Jared Brennan as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Lori Harrington discusses being rescued from her flooded home in the Richland Creek area of West Nashville during the May 2010 flood.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
